vsParam:
Mr. Bill Berry! I'm Cresson from the Academy Guard.
They are the students who offer to help you.

Oh, thank you for coming!
I'm Head of this village, Bill Berry.

Nice to meet you, Head Bill Berry.
We heard that Goblins are damaging your village...

Yeah, there is a Goblins' Den near our village.
They'd spoil the farmland originally.

If it happens once in a while, we'd take it as natural
and leave it... But it happens frequently recently...

Oh...
Is it due to something special...

I guess it's because a strong Goblin
named "Red Cap" moved here...

... I've heard of it. It's said it haunts everywhere
and robs people, very threatening.

The Goblins start to take action in an organized way
ever since it came here...

Ah haha, you look fierce...
So, we just need to defeat that "Red Cap", right?

Yes, thank you so much...
To protect Ruhuna Village's rich nature, please help us...

Um... Bill Berry.
I got a small question...

Is there any mark on the way to that Goblins' Den?
You know, the forest in front of us is...

Oh, right.
It's way too reckless to wander in the Lost Woods...

Here is a suggestion.
Please pay attention...
... You need to go straight forward from the entrance!

Uh, straight forward!?
Can we go there in this way?

Yeah, exactly. Goblins aren't smart creatures
even they can act in an organized way.

They can't remember roads that are too complicated.
So their den must be somewhere obvious!

Is... Is it good to look down upon them...
All... All right. We got it... Thank you.

Anyhow, go straight forward... Right?
Let's give it a try...
